# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/README ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/README ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_1416_dc.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1416_dc.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_1416_dc.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1416_dc.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1416_dc.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_1416_tran.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1416_tran.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_1416_tran.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1416_tran.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1416_tran.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME Certification_Tests/BUG_1416/bug_1416_tran.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_1416_tran.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_1416_tran.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1416/bug_1416_tran.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST Certification_Tests/BUG_1416/bug_1416_tran.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;csvfile")
add_test(NAME Certification_Tests/BUG_1416/bug_1416_dc.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_1416_dc.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_1416_dc.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1416/bug_1416_dc.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST Certification_Tests/BUG_1416/bug_1416_dc.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;csvfile")
